headline: AI-Driven Cyberattack Surge Could Be a Game Changer for Gen Digital (GEN)
summary: Gen Digital recently released its Q3 2025 Threat Report, revealing the emergence of 140,000 AI-generated phishing sites, a very large increase in data breaches, and a rising wave of AI-powered scam text message campaigns. The report also highlighted Gen's discovery of a flaw in Midnight Ransomware and the release of a free decryptor, assisting victims in recovering their files without ransom payments, underscoring the company’s active response to rapidly evolving cyber threats. We’ll assess...
